```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [1, 4, 9, 16, 25]

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Square Numbers')
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')

plt.show()
```

```py
import altair as alt
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({'x': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 'y': [1, 4, 9, 16, 25]})

chart = alt.Chart(df).mark_line().encode(
    x='x',
    y='y'
).properties(
    title='Square Numbers'
)

chart.save('chart.png')
```
